name: Easy Baked Stuffed Lobster Tails
author: nsaidi
summary: These lobster tails are so juicy and very easy to make. My husband loves them. You can add fresh garlic to the stuffing if you are a garlic lover.
ingredients: 8  cooked lobster tails, meat removed and shells reserved
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Line a baking pan with aluminum foil
Combine cooked lobster meat, bread crumbs, butter, Worcestershire sauce, and salt in a bowl
Fill the empty lobster tails with stuffing and brush with olive oil
Place stuffed lobster tails in the prepared baking pan; bringing the edges of the foil over the tails to cover
Bake until stuffing is completely cooked, about 50 minutes
